channel.title: Please help me with items
channel.description: okay first i dont want a horrible econemy by over spawning so i want kills added to my items as in i can spawn ags easy nothing at all i want kills added to it like mabey 15 or 20 kills to get it plus cash i have no clue how to do this please someone help me out it would be really nice.

item.title: Please help me with items

voodoo74502:

okay first i dont want a horrible econemy by over spawning so i want kills added to my items as in i can spawn ags easy nothing at all i want kills added to it like mabey 15 or 20 kills to get it plus cash i have no clue how to do this please someone help me out it would be really nice.

your english isn’t good at all, So its hard to see what you actually want.
so if you got a system already, Then change your shop to make it cost pkpoints && cash. Its really not that hard.
